modules.zones
Class ZonesModule

java.lang.Object
  modules.Module
      modules.zones.ZonesModule

public class ZonesModule
extends Module

Manages zones counters (entrance counters, central time, etc..).

Author:
Creative

Method Detail

updateZoneMap

public void updateZoneMap()
Updates the zone map array according to the shapes setup on the GfxPanel Note: zone map is an array of bytes, we can imagine it as a two dim. array (width*height) , where each byte contains the number of the zone existing at that point (x,y)

setScale

public void setScale(java.awt.Point p1,
                     java.awt.Point p2,
                     float real_distance)
Calculates the scale between real world and the cam image. using the distance between two points on the screen and the distance between them in real image.

Parameters:
p1 - First point of measurement
p2 - Second point of measurement
real_distance - distance entered by the user as real distance
